attributes.action: Require people to have Bikeability level 2 to take a driving test
attributes.additional_details: It's important that the conflict that can exist between drivers and cyclists ends to ensure that all road users can safely share the public roads.
attributes.background: Cycling on roads could be made safer by giving drivers a better understanding of cycling on roads. Many drivers have not experienced cycling on a road in traffic and may not always understand why cyclists do certain things. If drivers experienced this first hand it could make improve safety for all.
